data.title: Students Enrolment Policy & Procedure
data.meta_description: Learn about the most up-to-date information on enrolment at Viewbank College. You can find every information about the eligibility and fee structure for each program here.
data.text:
Enrolment Information

Our School Zone

Our school zone is available on findmyschool.vic.gov.au.

Findmyschool.vic.gov.au hosts the most up-to-date information about Victorian school zones.

Students residing in this zone are guaranteed a place at our school, which is determined on the basis of your permanent residential address.

The Department provides guidance through the School Placement Policy to ensure that students have access to their designated neighbourhood school and the freedom to choose other schools, subject to facility limitations.

You can find more information and answers to frequently asked questions on the Department’s website under School zones.

For more information

If you have a question about school zones call the VSBA Hotline on 1800 896 950 or email: vsba@edumail.vic.gov.au

YEAR 7 (Grade 6 into Year 7 Transition)

Please note that the process for Year 7 enrolment begins with your child’s Primary School. Primary Schools distribute a Department of Education and Training (DE&T) Year 7 Application Form to all Grade 6 students.

Virtual Tour

Dear Parents/Guardians and Prospective Year 7 Students,

During 2020 due to the COVID-19 situation, our face to face tours and Information Evening were unable to be continued as planned.

We acknowledge this is a very important and challenging time in your decision making for choosing a secondary school for your child. We believe it is important that you look holistically at schools to see which one will meet the needs of your child.

We believe that Viewbank College offers the right blend of academic focus, of wellbeing support and it being a community that welcomes and caters for all.

Please see below our Virtual Tour of Viewbank College, we hope you enjoy and see all the wonderful opportunities that Viewbank College can provide for your child.

YEARS 8 – 12 (and Year 7 applications outside of Grade 6 into Year 7 Transition)

Click to access the Student Application Form 2024.

This form is to be completed for enrolment enquiries for Years 8 to 12 only and for Year 7 applications after the transition process.

Please complete this form as the first step in your enquiry and forward to our Registrar, Lindy McKie via email: enrolments@viewbank.vic.edu.au or mail to The Registrar, Viewbank College, P.O. Box 264, Viewbank, Victoria, 3084.

ADF Families

Viewbank College has a Defence Transition Mentor (DTM) to assist and support ADF families in their transition between Defence facilities across Australia. This is a relatively new position at the college.

The Defence Transition Mentor (DTM) at Viewbank College is Raelene McKenzie and she is available Monday – Thursday on the college phone number: 9458 2811 or via email on MCK@viewbank.vic.edu.au

Raelene provides information, support and referral to Viewbank students and parents of ADF Families.

Raelene can offer support in a number of areas, but works specifically with students in the following ways:

Counselling for students – one to one

Peer mentoring and focus groups

Co-ordinating student events and parent meetings

Monitoring student attendance and emotional wellbeing

Referrals to outside agencies when appropriate

More information can be found at the links below-

Defence Community link – http://www.defence.gov.au/dco/

Defence Families of Australia–www.dfa.org.au

Enrolment Policy and Process

The College has experienced an increased demand for places in Year 7 but also in all other levels due to exceptional, unabated and unprecedented growth in its school population over the past five years. Viewbank College has an enrolment cap; therefore permanent residency in the immediate vicinity where the College is the closest school is the main consideration.

For more detailed information, please click on the following link for our Policy regarding Enrolment:
